title: Leveling up in a Fantasy World
overview: When he opened his eyes, he was in a different world, and he was bound by a simple system that told him that world domination was no longer a dream! Is there such a good thing? Qin Huai gave in and became a 007 working boy in the other world, earning points day and night, and the result was, of course, real! The divine weapons, the treasures, the supreme techniques and the gentle and lovely little sister, all of them come to his arms!
